entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Suffield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
